operations.summary: Export all API resources to a JSON file.
operations.notes:
For the /configStore resource type, only the settings that are different from the defaults for this version of PingFederate are included in the export.

Only resource types currently supported by the Administrative API are included in the exported data. Resources not yet supported include:

- PingOne Settings
- Incoming Proxy Settings
- SMS Provider Settings
- Connection Metadata Settings
- WS-Trust STS Settings
- Service Authentication Settings
- Inbound Provisioning Connections and Stores

parameters.name: includeExternalResources
parameters.description: Include external resources like OAuth clients stored outside of PingFederate.

responseMessages.message: The current configuration cannot be bulk exported.

operations.summary: Import configuration for a PingFederate deployment from a JSON file.
operations.notes: All existing configuration will be wiped before the import begins. If any validation errors are found, PingFederate will roll back to the previous configuration. The master key set in pf.jwk must include the key in use when the JSON configuration was originally exported.

parameters.name: failFast
parameters.description: When set to true, stops the import as soon as any validation errors are encountered.

parameters.name: X-BypassExternalValidation
parameters.description: External validation will be bypassed when set to true. Default to false.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.

BulkConfig.description: Model describing a series of configuration operations.

metadata.description: The metadata detailing how this config was generated.

BulkConfigMetadata.description: Model describing how bulk configuration data was generated.

pfVersion.description: The version of PingFederate this config was generated from.

ConfigOperation.description: Model describing a list of configuration operations for a given resource type.

resourceType.description: The identifier for the resource type the operation applies to.

operationType.description: The type of operation to be performed.

items.description: The configuration items for the operation. This field only applies to the SAVE operation type.

itemIds.description: The item ID's for the operation. This field only applies to the DELETE operation type.
